title: refactor(http2-stream): inline single-use function clear_pending_header_block
body:
## Issue
Single-use helper function adds unnecessary indirection.

**File**: `src/http/SocketHTTP2-stream.c`  
**Lines**: 1286-1292  
**Function**: `clear_pending_header_block`  
**Pattern**: SINGLE_USE_INLINE  
**Severity**: HIGH  
**Size**: 6 lines  
**Usage**: Called once from `http2_process_continuation` at line 2401

## Current Code
\`\`\`c
static void
clear_pending_header_block (SocketHTTP2_Stream_T stream)
{
  stream->header_block = NULL;
  stream->header_block_len = 0;
  stream->header_block_capacity = 0;
}
\`\`\`

## Recommendation
Inline at the single call site in `http2_process_continuation`:
\`\`\`c
/* Clear pending header block */
stream->header_block = NULL;
stream->header_block_len = 0;
stream->header_block_capacity = 0;
\`\`\`

## Benefits
- Eliminates unnecessary function call overhead
- Reduces code indirection
- Makes cleanup logic more visible
- Simplifies codebase (one less function to maintain)
